pages.text: $(bgreen)Imitater$() remembers the Zombie Wars back in 1976. Back then, dave didn't have all these fancy peashooters and jalapenos. All he had was guts. Guts and a spoon.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)?$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)?$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is an $(l)instant-assist$() plant that can let its owner use two of the same plant, with $(bred)independent cool down$().
